log: A beach battle royale commences, with Bri (high health, decent attack/defense, high intelligence, low speed) as one of the contestants.
Bri, the only combatant in a beach battle royale, self-harmed to lower her health.  Her attempt was successful, resulting in a significant but non-fatal health reduction.
Bri, recovering from a battle, received a generous sum of gold from a kindly merchant.  She left with significantly more wealth.
Bri bought a superior bow and quiver at the market, upgrading her archery arsenal.  She's now ready for any challenges, especially those on the beach.

magnificent new bow, quiver, extra arrows, previous bow, previous arrows
